title: Where can you find the remaining games left on LeaveBuster?
body:
Just logged in for the first time in like 3 months, I have a 20 minute queue ban apparently....
Doesn't say how many games are left or anything. Anywhere I can find how many games I have to play through?
Also any tips on how to speed my way through getting out of this low priority queue?

replies.body: play a game then it will tell you how many left
After you play any game mode (not custom) they will tell you how many games you have left on low prior Q at the top left corner
play bots its much faster to get em done
